components: SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC,ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING
summary: AT 70208 MILES DEALER REPLACED WATER PUMP AT MY COST, AGAIN AT 91000 MILES DEALER REPLACED WATER PUMP.  AFTER COMPLAINING TO GM THE DEALER AGREED TO WARRANTY PARTS AND LABOR.  2 WATER PUMPS IN 91000 MILES!  #2 BRAKES AT 48911 DEALER REPLACED FRONT DISC AND WARPED ROTORS.  AGAIN AT 91000 MILES DEALER SAYS ROTORS ARE WARPED AGAIN AND REPLACED, BOTH TIMES AT COST.  2 SETS OF ROTORS IN 91000 MILES!  NEITHER TIME WERE THE ROTORS VISUALLY DAMAGED OR WORN FROM DISC PADS.    *NLM      **DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS*734293
